thread.title: Abu Dhabi Investor Takes Stake in Venture Capital Firm 500 Startups

author: Nicolas Parasie
title: Abu Dhabi Investor Takes Stake in Venture Capital Firm 500 Startups
text:
A United Arab Emirates-based investment company on Tuesday said it is taking a large minority stake in 500 Startups, the first time the Silicon Valley startup accelerator’s parent has accepted outside funding.
Abu Dhabi Financial Group, an investment group with $6.5 billion in assets under management, previously invested in one of 500 Startups’ funds as a limited partner. The funding comes as 500 Startups undergoes a broad shake-up after former chief executive and co-founder Dave McClureresigned last July in connection with... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
